info: This case study is oriented towards a landing page that serves to show the base information of this Project, This project is based on creating a SAAP software (Software As A Product), to sell users a service that allows them to pay their telephone bills of water light, general services, so that they can start micro businesses and provide services to people who do not know how to use these technologies.

The first stage of this process was created the views of the page and later we are going to make modifications in the already created system. For this project, Adobe XD was used to create the user interfaces and the implementation of the navigation flow, later we initialize the project in React and we store it in an internal repository on GitHub, then we begin to make each view within its respective branch to make Pull Request and thus not alter the Project master.

Once the views were completed, we began to make the responsive in two phases: Phase one would be the optimization in terms of screen resolution And phase two would be use in terms of browsers, finally we made the text assembly and added some animations that did not are so invasive to give a fresh and modern touch to the page.
